already_installed_text: Translation with same version is already installed.
download_list_text:
Below are the Translations that are required and available at Nexus Mods. Choose desired translations where appropiate and click on "Download all" if you have Premium or download them manually if you don't.
If you don't have Premium, make sure that SSE-AT is linked to Mod Manager Downloads (link button is in Translations panel).
import_local: Import Translation from local Hard Drive
import_nm: Import Translation from Nexus Mods URL
show_vanilla_strings: Show Base Game (+ AE CC Content) Strings
